name: Man-Spider!
description:
PLEASE PLAY ON FULLSCREEN TO VIEW THE WHOLE LEVEL USING F11!

You were bitten by a human, thus not being able to stick to walls. Can you complete these 7 puzzles using only your webs?

This is a puzzle game, you only have three webs per level and must reach your cobweb to move on. 

Made for the Mini Jam 123.

Theme: Web.

Limitation: No Ground.
